pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Mercury Engine Data StructuresConstruct type definitions for Mercury Engine| Format | Samus Returns (Read) | Samus Returns (Write) | Dread (Read) | Dread (Write) || -------- |----------------------| --------------------- | ------------ | ------------- || PKG | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ || BMSAD | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ || BMSSD | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ || BRFLD | Missing | Missing | ✓ | ✓ || BMSLD | ✓ | ✓ | Missing | Missing || BMSCC | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ || BRSA | Missing | Missing | ✓ | ✓ |## Example Usage```python# TODO```## Colors for TextMetroid Dread uses the following annotations in text to change color:| Code | Color | ||------|-------------|--------------|| {c0} | White | (Default) || {c1} | Yellow | || {c2} | Red | || {c3} | Pink | || {c4} | Green | || {c5} | Blue | || {c6} | UI Active | (Light blue) || {c7} | UI Inactive | (Dim blue) |
